mentions.context: For the next evaluations, we used GM and WM ROIs, issued form the GM and WM probability maps resulting from T1w MRI segmentation using Freesurfer as described in 2.2.1.
We performed MRI non-parametric non-uniformity intensity normalization, tissue class segmentation, and anatomical parcellation of the T1w 3D volumes with Freesurfer (34).
